job_title: Senior Business Development Manager, EV Sales - Airport/Public Sector Specialist
job_description:
Scope of Position

PowerFlex, an EDF Renewables company, is a leading national provider of intelligent onsite energy solutions that support carbon-free electrification and transportation. The Company delivers integrated solar, storage, EV charging, and microgrid systems, to businesses and organizations. As a single full-service provider, PowerFlex customizes clean technology solutions to help clients achieve their energy and sustainability goals. Through the comprehensive PowerFlex X platform, PowerFlex leverages patented smart software to control, monitor, and optimize a client's distributed energy resources to reduce cost and maximize return on investment.

PowerFlex seeks an executive level sales professional with extensive experience selling into airports and/or public sector entities. Although PowerFlex has demonstrated success and referenceable customers in both airport and municipal segments, the position requires a self-motivated hunter disposition. The ideal candidate would have experience selling energy related products and/or services, but PowerFlex remains open to candidates who have also sold non-energy solutions into these sectors. The candidate will have experience navigating the typical multi-stakeholder and RFP evaluation process and be able to articulate how they leverage resources to navigate through these processes to successfully execute high value ($1M >) contracts.

Responsibilities
• Originate new C&I, institutional and multi-unit dwelling accounts and turnkey EV charging opportunities through (but not limited to) cold calling, email campaigns, networking and participating in trade shows and conferences
• Identify new sales verticals, strategies, and lead sources to grow a pipeline with repeat customers
• Develop new and existing relationships with corporate executives, energy/facility/property managers and owners
• Take full ownership of your customer’s success by ensuring high-touch client servicing and problem solving as their EV charging subject matter expert
• Regularly prepare and lead compelling virtual and in-person client presentations
• Guide EV charging customers on the value of adding onsite solar and storage (with the help of PowerFlex subject matter experts)
• Skillfully manage a pipeline of nurture and working opportunities to meet and exceed individual volume and revenue targets
• Collaborate with internal teams to develop incentive response campaigns
• Work closely with cross-functional teams in Marketing, Technologies, Engineering, Execution and Asset Management
• Immerse yourself in the EV charging space by tracking market changes, technology/OEMs, incentive programs, general EV trends and understanding the needs of EV drivers
• Develop a strong technical baseline through training and development milestones

Qualifications

Education/Experience –
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience
• At least 10 years of sales experience in the Renewable Energy or Public Sector services industries.
• Conducting outbound origination calls and emails
• Managing a pipeline of actionable sales opportunities
• Sales quota attainment
• Leading successful RFP and RFI responses

Skills/Knowledge/Abilities –
• Excitement for the EV industry and renewable energy at large
• Optimistic attitude, Persistence, Focus
• Drive, initiative, and Technical curiosity
• Communication ninja (verbal and written)
• Self-motivation with strong execution capabilities
• Team spirit & leadership (it takes a village to succeed)
• Road warrior (regional travel up to 40%)
• Highly organized and able to juggle 10 projects in various phases simultaneously without a decrease in quality
